questions.question: How many different ways can we order the three different elements of the set A = {a, b, c}?
How many ways can you select 2 items out of 5?
In horse racing, to bet the 'daily double' is to select the winners of the first two races of the day...
questions.answer: Varies based on the number of horses in the races

questions.question: Calculate the probability of drawing a red card from a standard deck.
